overview:
Bong Doh Koh is currently co-founder and Development Lead at Lifecrowd. Prior to launching Lifecrowd, Bong Doh was one of the first software engineers at VideoEgg, now SAY Media. While VideoEgg was in the online video business, he led development on the content review and recommendation platform. After the company’s successful transition into the advertising space, he then led the engineering team responsible for the publishing partners’ reporting and analytics site. Prior to SAY Media, he helped launch ibeatyou (acquired by OVGuide).

Bong has also been active in the non profit educational space having served as the founding IT Manager for the Won Institute of Graduate Studies. He holds a BA from Yale University and took a leave of absence (now permanent) from the Masters in Computer Science program at Columbia University.
